body: GV author Filip Stojanovski was interviewed [MKD] for the TV show Nie ("We") on the topic of “Kale, Internet, political parties, Facebook!? Whose fault is it?”, where he spoke about the importance of citizen media and Global Voices. The show also included a segment of Ethan Zuckerman's TED talk.
original_body: GV author Filip Stojanovski was interviewed [MKD] for the TV show Nie ("We") on the topic of “Kale, Internet, political parties, Facebook!? Whose fault is it?”, where he spoke about the importance of citizen media and Global Voices. The show also included a segment of Ethan Zuckerman's TED talk.
title: Macedonia: Global Voices Featured on a TV Show
